summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of the City of Seattle in the aggregate sum of $5000,000 for the purpose of providing funds for the purchase of land for parks, parkways and playgrounds, the improvement thereof and the payment of existing indebtedness incurred for such purposes or some of them, and for the further improvement of parks, parkways and playgrounds, being a part of $2,000,000 bonds of the City of Seattle, authorized at an election held March 8, 1910; and directing the issuance of bonds in the sum of $500,000 and the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
